title: When an offline layer is applied in Google Maps the shapes are not visible
body:
#### ODK Collect version
after merging PR 5478
#### Android version
10, 13
#### Device used
Redmi 9T,  Galaxy A32
#### Problem description
When an offline layer is applied (probably raster) in Google Maps the shapes are not visible. If the user reopens the map, the shape is visible on an offline layer
#### Steps to reproduce the problem
1. Choose Google Maps as a source of maps 
2. Go to the selectoneformmapgeojsonpr2.xlsx form.
     
[pr2.geojson.txt](https://github.com/getodk/collect/files/10958412/pr2.geojson.txt)
[selectonefrommapgeojsonpr2.xlsx.txt](https://github.com/getodk/collect/files/10958413/selectonefrommapgeojsonpr2.xlsx.txt)
3. Choose and an offline layer (file on the drive).
https://drive.google.com/drive/u/0/folders/1IeuxQZU8Sw90PAOnTRlMToB3Wp_LuCoN 

https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/56479916/224731979-489e15e6-9958-47ee-ae9f-8343de34d2b7.mp4


#### Expected behavior
shapes should be visible when an offline layer is applied.
